data.text: @and_another_fan @RyanPhillippe Of course you would, because you’re a good person
@burnttautumn @RyanPhillippe Indeed. I know its easy said, but i think I'd really say "It's worth it" and publish it on my own if my employer wont let me

@and_another_fan @RyanPhillippe Exactly, you’d probably lose your job pretty quickly but the truth should mean way more to people than a job, and they would get so much backlash for questioning a woman, this world is so fucking infuriating

@burnttautumn @RyanPhillippe Honesty if I was working as a reporter and had the chance to, I would do it.
It either gives you that top story when she messes up or you may get fired, idk how easily you loose you job as a reporter tbh

@and_another_fan @RyanPhillippe Exactly, but it would be so much easier for the world to see that she’s lying if she’s called out on the spot. I just honestly can’t believe that it hasn’t happened to her yet. You’d think the truth would mean more than a job to some people.
@burnttautumn I love and completely agree with your conclusion Venus.
@and_another_fan @RyanPhillippe // question her integrity and call her out for who she truly is in an interview.

@and_another_fan @RyanPhillippe Exactly. That’s what I meant by she didn’t win anything, she’s set the bar for people now, she really has ruined it for real victims, because of her, women are trying to do the same to other men. It sickens me that there isn’t a single reporter out there that is willing to //

If a man had made these accusations, first of all, he wouldn’t automatically be believed like women, and secondly, once shown to be false, they would be over. The media would have a field day. It’s time the world realised that feminism is for equality. Not for hate.
@burnttautumn @RyanPhillippe *sigh* Apart from that you can't even win a settlement, that's why it's called "settlement"

@RyanPhillippe Innocent men are being falsely accused for this horrendous crime just so women can try and make a bit extra money, and when Hollywood and the media do absolutely NOTHING to address the fact that that’s all they are, allegations. Women are going to continue to get away with it
